column1: This table was copied by hand from Appendix 3 of 'Checklist of the ants (Hymenoptera, Formicidae) of the Solomon Islands and a new survey of Makira Island'. Guadalcanal, Makira, Malaupair, Rendova, Rennel, Russel, Tulagi and Ugi had different richness than given in the original table and they were recounted once or twice and not all total richness match the original values.
